verses.verse: And after <S%H310>this<s%> it came to <S%H1732>pass<s%>, that David <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H3947>them<s%>, and took <S%H1661>Gath<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.
And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; and the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%> unto <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>, as he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5324>establish<s%> his <S%H3027>dominion<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> from him a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>footmen<s%>; and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6131>hocked<s%> all the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H3498>horses<s%>, but reserved of them for a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>.
And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succor Hadarezer king of Zobah, David smote of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> garrisons in <S%H758>Syria<s%> of <S%H758>Damascus<s%>; and the Syrians became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7982>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that were on the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And from <S%H2880>Tibhath<s%> and from <S%H3560>Cun<s%>, <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>, wherewith <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

And when <S%H8583>Tou<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> all the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>,

he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, to <S%H7592>salute<s%> <S%H7965>him<s%>, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3898>him<s%>, because he had fought against <S%H1928>Hadarezer<s%> and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H1928>him<s%>; (for Hadarezer had <S%H376>wars<s%> with <S%H8583>Tou<s%>;) and he had with him all manner of <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

These also did <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that he <S%H5375>carried<s%> away from all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; from <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and from <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and from the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and from <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>.

Moreover <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> of the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> in the <S%H1516>Valley<s%> of <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%>; and all the <S%H123>Edomites<s%> became <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave <S%H3467>victory<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> whithersoever he <S%H1980>went<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> unto all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> was over the <S%H6635>host<s%>; and <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H286>Ahilud<s%> was <S%H2142>recorder<s%>;

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>, were <S%H3548>priests<s%>; and <S%H7798>Shavsha<s%> was <S%H5608>scribe<s%>;

and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was over the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%> and the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> were <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H3027>about<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
